title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 175.10 - Broker's offering property for sale must be authorized
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 175.10 - Broker's offering property for sale must be authorized

State Regulations
A real estate broker shall never offer a property for sale
or lease without the authorization of the owner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
175.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
